cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)

add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/assimp)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/Box2D)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/Bullet)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/KhSTL)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/LZ4)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/OpenAL)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/SDL2)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/STB)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/glad)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/Auto3D/ThirdParty/FreeType)
